name: Snake Dice (chewdawg)
description:
Snake Dice

Made for the 2022 GMTK jam. Theme roll of the dice. Plays on desktop and most mobile browsers.

This is a game where the snake movement is dictated by the roll of the dice.

Every time you have an opportunity to move a dice is rolled. You must move this many units.

  • Eat the pellets to gain more points and grow longer
    • Each time you eat a pellet, a space on the board will randomly become blocked
  • If you make a dice roll larger than the available potential movement space, you lose

Move with either:

  • Touch or click the screen movement indicators
  • W, A, S, D
  • Up, Down, Left and Right

This game was made using a custom Typescript Game engine call the Based Engine.
